TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EntityDataSource extends System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl implements class System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource, class System.Web.UI.IDataSource, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.IQueryableDataSource
Public Class EntityDataSource Inherits DataSourceControl Implements IDynamicDataSource, IQueryableDataSource

summary.span: 表示 ASP.NET 应用程序中数据绑定控件的实体数据模型 (EDM)。

span.span: Represents an Entity Data Model (EDM) to data-bound controls in an ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 你可以使用以及从 EDM 中检索数据并将显示、 编辑，并通过使用很少或没有代码在网页上的数据进行排序的数据绑定控件的控件。You can use the control together with a data-bound control to retrieve data from an EDM and to display, edit, and sort data on a Web page by using little or no code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[EntityDataSource Web 服务器控件概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f09af00-9578-4744-a029-765710a3c83f)。For more information, see [EntityDataSource Web Server Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f09af00-9578-4744-a029-765710a3c83f). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ```

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection connection) cil managed

span.span: An to the Entity Data Model (EDM).

summary.span: 使用提供的连接初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the provided connection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoGenerateOrderByClause { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件是否根据 集合中的值动态创建 ORDER BY 子句。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control dynamically creates an ORDER BY clause based on values in the collection.

value.span: 如果 控件创建 ORDER BY 子句，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control creates the ORDER BY clause; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性控件设置为`true`，该控件自动生成 ORDER BY 子句中的参数从分配给属性。When the property of the control is set to `true`, the control automatically generates an ORDER BY clause from the parameter in the assigned to the property. 这消除了需要显式将分配到 ORDER BY 子句属性。This eliminates the need to explicitly assign an ORDER BY clause to the property. 如果你设置属性`true`，你应显式将值赋给属性。If you set the property to `true`, you should not explicitly assign a value to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例自动生成 ORDER BY 子句，并使用的值`OrderByDropDownList`设置参数的值。The following example automatically generates the ORDER BY clause and uses the value of the `OrderByDropDownList` to set the value of the parameter. ``` ``` 下面的示例自动生成 ORDER BY 子句，并使用`DefaultValue`属性`Parameter`元素中设置参数的值。The following example automatically generates the ORDER BY clause and uses the `DefaultValue` attribute of the `Parameter` element to set the value of the parameter. ``` ```

exception.span: 当 属性设置为 ，同时 属性设置为非 null。

span.span: When the property is set to and the property is not null.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoGenerateWhereClause { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件是否基于 集合中定义的值来动态创建 WHERE 子句。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control dynamically creates a WHERE clause based on values defined in the collection.

value.span: 如果 控件创建 WHERE 子句，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control creates the WHERE clause; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要通过使实体类型属性等于表达式筛选查询结果，可以使用属性。To filter query results by equating an entity type property to an expression, you can use the property. 当属性控件设置为`true`，该控件自动生成`WHERE`子句中的参数从的属性。When the property of the control is set to `true`, the control automatically generates a `WHERE` clause from the parameters in the of the property. 每个参数的属性必须与匹配查询结果中包含的实体类型属性名。The property of each parameter has to match an entity type property name that is included in the query results. 如果你设置属性`true`，您应显式分配`WHERE`子句属性。If you set the property to `true`, you should not explicitly assign a `WHERE` clause to the property. ## 示例Example 在下面的示例属性设置为`true`。In the following example the property is set to `true`. 因此，的属性必须与匹配查询结果中包含的实体类型属性名。Therefore, the of the property has to match an entity type property name that is included in the query results. 查询选择 SalesOrderHeader 实体类型的 SalesOrderID 和 TotalDue 属性。The query selects the SalesOrderID and TotalDue properties of the SalesOrderHeader entity type. 自动生成`WHERE`子句将通过比较 TotalDue 值与在 TotalDueList 列表框控件中选择的值来筛选查询结果。The automatically generated `WHERE` clause will filter the query results by comparing the TotalDue value to a value selected in the TotalDueList list box control. ``` ``` ## 示例Example 默认情况下， 属性设置为 `false`。By default, the property is set to `false`. 这意味着，我们必须提供`WHERE`子句。This means that we have to supply the `WHERE` clause. 在下面的示例中，`WHERE`子句是`Where="it.TotalDue < @totalDueParam"`和 totalDueParam 是参数名称。In the following example, the `WHERE` clause is `Where="it.TotalDue < @totalDueParam"` and totalDueParam is the parameter name. ``` ```

exception.span: 当 属性设置为 ，同时 属性设置为非 null。

span.span: When the property is set to and the property is not null.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoPage { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件是否支持在运行时在数据的各部分之间导航。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control supports navigation through sections of the data at run time.

value.span: 如果用户可以对数据进行分页，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user can page through the data; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持自动分页查询返回的数据。The control supports automatically paging through the data returned by queries. 属性是布尔值属性，该值指示是否为绑定到数据控件的查询所返回的数据启用了分页。The property is a Boolean property that indicates whether paging is enabled for data that is returned by queries bound to data controls. 当此属性设置为`true`、控件添加到相应的查询生成器方法根据的信息提供给由数据绑定控件。When this property is set to `true`, the control adds the appropriate query builder methods to the based on the information supplied to the by the data-bound control. 值属性确定是否属性支持数据源的控件是`true`或`false`。The value of the property determines whether the property of the control that supports the data source is `true` or `false`. 当使用启用的分页定义投影时，必须定义对结果进行排序依据的属性。When you define a projection with paging enabled, you must define the property by which to order the results. 这意味着，当你设置属性定义投影并让设置为`true`，还必须设置属性来定义的顺序或设置属性`true`并添加订单通过参数集合。This means that when you set the property to define a projection and have set to `true`, you must also set the property to define the order or set the property to `true` and add an ORDER BY parameter to the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoSort { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件是否支持在运行时对数据进行排序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control supports sorting the data at run time.

value.span: 如果用户可以对数据进行排序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user can sort the data; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持自动对查询返回的数据进行排序。The control supports automatically sorting the data returned by queries. 属性控件是布尔值属性，该值指示是否为绑定到数据控件的查询所返回的数据启用排序。The property of the control is a Boolean property that indicates whether sorting is enabled for data that is returned by queries that are bound to data controls. 当此属性设置为`true`、控件添加到相应的查询生成器方法根据的信息提供给由数据绑定控件。When this property is set to `true`, the control adds the appropriate query builder methods to the based on the information supplied to the by the data-bound control. 值属性确定是否和属性支持数据源的控件是`true`或`false`。The value of the property determines whether the and properties of the control that supports the data source is `true` or `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CommandParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 获取查询的参数集合。

span.span: Gets the parameter collection for the query.

value.span: 一个包含传递给查询命令的参数的 。

span.span: A that contains the parameters that are passed to the query command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性访问到使用指定的显式 Entity SQL 查询传递的参数属性。The property is used to access the of parameters that are passed to an explicit Entity SQL query that is specified using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例提供了返回 Product 对象的集合的 Entity SQL 命令文本。The following example supplies Entity SQL command text that returns a collection of Product objects. ``` ``` 下面的示例将返回一系列投影的列：The following example returns a projected series of columns: ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CommandText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置定义查询的 Entity SQL 命令。

span.span: Gets or sets an Entity SQL command that defines the query.

value.span: Entity SQL 查询的 值。

span.span: A value that is the Entity SQL query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控制，你可以指定使用的自定义的 Entity SQL 表达式的查询。The property of the control enables you to specify a query that uses a custom Entity SQL expression. 如 SELECT 语句中，创建不是可更新的原始数据的投影。Like the SELECT statement, creates a projection of the original data that is not updatable. 当属性分配，更新、 插入和删除功能处于禁用状态。When the property is assigned, update, insert, and delete functionalities are disabled. 在此情况下，方法， ，和将相关控件都返回`false`。In this case, the methods , , and of the related control all return `false`. 当属性设置，则会引发异常方法由数据绑定到某个控件调用如果控制的值， ，或设置为`true`。When the property is set, an exception is thrown when the method is called by a control that is data bound to an control if the value of , , or is set to `true`. 如果设置为返回的属性投影的查询 (例如，"`SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`")、 一个将返回。If the is set to a query that returns a projection of properties (for example, "`SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`"), a will be returned. ## Examples 下面的示例使用到提供的 Entity SQL 命令返回 Product 对象的集合。The following example uses the supplied Entity SQL command to returns a collection of Product objects. ``` ``` 下面的示例将返回一系列投影的列：The following example returns a projected series of columns: ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ConnectionString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于执行查询的连接字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the connection string that is used to execute the query.

value.span: 查询的连接字符串。

span.span: The connection string for the query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以从存储在应用程序配置文件的元素的命名 EDM 连接字符串初始化控件。The property of the control can be initialized from a named EDM connection string stored in the element of the application configuration file. EDM 由使用实体数据模型向导创建的是在应用程序配置文件中创建命名的 EDM 连接。When the EDM is created by using the Entity Data Model Wizard, a named EDM connection is created in the application configuration file. 在应用程序配置文件中找到命名的 EDM 连接字符串，则连接时，显示为 EntityDataSource 设计器中配置数据源向导的一个选项。When a named EDM connection string is found in the application configuration file, the connection is visible as an option in the Configure Data Source wizard of the EntityDataSource designer. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据源配置向导 （EntityDataSource 控件）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/263976a5-2406-47c0-8919-c6af6e76d78e)。For more information, see [Configure Data Source Wizard (EntityDataSource Control)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/263976a5-2406-47c0-8919-c6af6e76d78e). 如果未指定属性，这两个和必须为要创建的控件设置属性。If the property is not specified, both the and properties must be set for the control to create the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ContextCreated As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceContextCreatedEventArgs)

summary.span: 在 创建完用于处理实体数据对象的 之后发生。

span.span: Occurs when the has finished creating the that is used to work with entity data objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理此事件以访问，它由控件来执行查询和跟踪更改。Handle this event to access the that is used by the control to execute the query and track changes. 可存储此上下文对象，并将其用于之外的后续操作。This context object can be stored and used for successive operations outside the . 从获取返回事件。The is obtained from the that is returned by the event. 有关详细信息，请参阅[对象上下文生命周期管理 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160)。For more information, see [Object Context Life-Cycle Management (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160). 有关对象上下文的详细信息，请参阅[标识解析、 状态管理和更改跟踪](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)。For more information about the object context, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0). 事件允许您分配已到之外的后续操作的变量。The event allows you to assign the that has been created to a variable for successive operations outside the . 属性包含已在中创建的上下文事件。The property contains the context that has been created in the event. 如果用户不会分配期间上下文上下文实例中包含的事件，是通过创建基于， ，或属性。If the user does not assign a context during the event, the context instance contained in is the one created by the based on the , , or properties.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ContextCreating As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs)

summary.span: 当 创建用于处理实体数据对象的 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the creates the that is used to work with entity data objects.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ContextDisposing As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceContextDisposingEventArgs)

summary.span: 在释放 之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before an is disposed of.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理此事件以防止由从正在释放的控件。Handle this event to prevent the used by the control from being disposed of. 执行此操作时要使用单个与多个控件或的实例在页中的实例控件。Do this when you want to use a single instance in your page with several controls or instances of the control. 若要防止从正在释放，设置属性对象传递给`true`。To prevent the from being disposed of, set the property of the object to `true`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[对象上下文生命周期管理 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160)。For more information, see [Object Context Life-Cycle Management (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160). 有关对象上下文的详细信息，请参阅[标识解析、 状态管理和更改跟踪](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)。For more information about the object context, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0). ## Examples 若要保留现有将来参考取消的实例成员事件，如下面的代码所示。To keep an existing instance member for future reference cancel the event as shown by the following code. ```csharp protected void EntityDataSource2_ContextDisposing(object sender, EntityDataSourceContextDisposingEventArgs e) { e.Cancel = true; } ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Type ^ ContextType { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };

value.span: 从 派生的对象。

span.span: An object that derives from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由控制可以访问从属性。The used by the control can be accessed from the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[对象上下文生命周期管理 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160)。For more information, see [Object Context Life-Cycle Management (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160).

span.span: A that is the fully qualified name of the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控件是一个字符串，指定的类型化的完全限定的类型名称，它由控件。The property of the control is a string that specifies the fully qualified type name of the typed that is used by the control. 如果未指定属性，这两个和必须为要创建的控件设置属性。If the property is not specified, both the and properties must be set for the control to create the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Deleted As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs)

summary.span: 在从数据源中删除对象之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after an object has been deleted from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后引发事件方法只需成功在调用了删除对象。The event is raised after the method has just been successfully called on the to delete an object. 属性对象用于访问已删除的对象。The property of the object is used to access the deleted object. 此对象处于状态。This object is in a state. 如果删除一个对象，时发生了错误引发事件时，属性对象设置为返回，和属性设置为`null`。If an error occurs when an object is deleted, the event is raised, the property of the object is set to the returned , and the property is set to `null`. 如果你处理中的异常事件处理程序中，设置属性`true`。If you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 这可防止再次引发异常。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 当指定的值`false`为属性，重新引发异常。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DeleteParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 获取在删除操作过程中使用的参数的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that are used during a delete operation.

value.span: 在删除操作过程中使用的参数。

span.span: The parameters that are used during a delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于面向 ASP.NET 4 或更早版本的 web 应用程序，属性值存储在视图状态，并自动维护之间回发。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4 or earlier, the property value is stored in view state and is automatically maintained between postbacks. 对于 web 应用程序面向 ASP.NET 4.5，该属性值不存储视图状态中，必须设置为每个 HTTP 请求的值。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4.5, the property value is not stored in view state, and you must set the value for each HTTP request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Deleting As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs)

summary.span: 在从数据源中删除对象之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before an object is deleted from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件之前，将引发方法调用删除对象。The event is raised before the method is called on the to delete an object. 属性对象用于访问要删除的对象。The property of the object is used to access the object to be deleted. 此对象的属性不能完全设置。The properties of this object may not be fully set. 必须设置仅需标识对象的属性。Only the properties required to identify the object must be set. 若要停止在被删除的对象，设置属性对象传递给`true`。To stop the object from being deleted, set the property of the object to `true`. 如果删除对象，正在准备时发生了错误引发事件和属性对象设置为返回。If an error occurs when preparing to delete an object, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 当处理中的异常事件处理程序中，设置属性`true`。When you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 这可防止再次引发异常。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 当指定的值`false`为属性，重新引发异常。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableDelete { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以通过 控件删除对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether objects can be deleted through the control.

value.span: 如果启用了自动删除操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if automatic delete operations are enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不能设置启用属性。 cannot be set if the property is enabled. A`false`值分配给属性强制将相关属性要返回对象`false`。A `false` value assigned to the property on the forces the property of the related object to return `false`. 当属性设置为`false`、如果数据绑定控件调用引发方法。When the property is set to `false`, a is raised if the data-bound control calls the method on the . 如果不满足任何条件，updatability 和属性设置为`true`、引发异常。If any of the conditions for updatability are not met and the property is set to `true`, the raises an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableFlattening { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否关闭包装创建。

span.span: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether you want to turn off wrapper creation.

value.span: 如果将展平属性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the properties will be flattened; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当初始化控件通过使用属性，将每个实体实例包装的对象中的结果在类型。When you initialize the control by using the property, the wraps each entity instance in the results in an object of the type. 有关详细信息，请参阅[平展对象 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08a30ef3-1132-4ac4-856c-5ed3d65eaf16)。For more information, see [Flattening Objects (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08a30ef3-1132-4ac4-856c-5ed3d65eaf16).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableInsert { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以通过 控件添加对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether objects can be added through the control.

value.span: 如果启用了自动插入操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if automatic insert operations are enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不能设置属性设置为`true`。 cannot be set if the property is set to `true`. A`false`值分配给属性强制将相关属性要返回对象`false`。A `false` value assigned to the property on the forces the property of the related object to return `false`. 当属性设置为`false`、如果数据绑定控件调用引发方法。When the property is set to `false`, a is raised if the data-bound control calls the method on the . 如果不满足任何条件，updatability 和属性设置为`true`、引发异常。If any of the conditions for updatability are not met and the property is set to `true`, the raises an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableUpdate { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以通过 控件修改对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether objects can be modified through the control.

value.span: 如果启用了自动更新操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if automatic update operations are enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不能设置属性设置为`true`。 cannot be set if the property is set to `true`. A`false`值分配给属性强制将相关属性要返回对象`false`。A `false` value assigned to the property forces the property of the related object to return `false`. 当属性设置为`false`、如果数据绑定控件调用引发方法。When the property is set to `false`, a is raised if the data-bound control calls the method on the . 设置属性`true`不保证可更新性。Setting the property to `true` does not guarantee updatability. 如果不满足任何条件，updatability 和属性设置为`true`、引发异常。If any of the conditions for updatability are not met and the property is set to `true`, the raises an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ EntitySetName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件使用的实体集的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the entity set used by the control.

value.span: 实体集名称。

span.span: The entity set name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控件用于指定由控件访问的对象的类型的实体集。The property of the control is used to specify the entity set of the type of the objects that are accessed by the control. 值属性是由该控件的默认选择语句。The value of the property is the default SELECT statement that is used by the control. 如果查询指定为 Entity SQL 表达式，用于提供给不需要的设置属性。The setting is not required if the query is specified as an Entity SQL expression that is supplied to the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[自定义命令文本 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d42e90d0-1443-474e-8940-53f504d6fc91)。For more information, see [Custom Command Text (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d42e90d0-1443-474e-8940-53f504d6fc91).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ EntityTypeFilter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置将查询结果限定为特定派生类型的表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets the expression that limits the query to only results of a specific derived type.

value.span: 筛选器表达式。

span.span: The filter expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件必须返回一个特定的派生的类型，属性还必须设置为指定此派生类型的名称。When the control must return a specific derived type, the property must also be set to specify the name of this derived type. 如果属性指定的实体集，可以生成多态结果能够编辑数据所需的属性。If the property specifies an entity set that can generate polymorphic results, the property is required to be able to edit data. 这具有与应用相同的效果方法。This has the same effect as applying the method to the . 如果数据绑定是只读的则属性不是必需。If the data binding is read-only, then the property is not required. 在这种情况下，由查询返回的对象的属性将这些实体集的默认实体类型。In this case, the properties of the object returned by the query will be those of the default entity type for the entity set.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.DataSourceView GetView(string viewName) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetView (viewName As String) As DataSourceView

param.name: viewName

span.span: The name of the view to retrieve.

param.span: 由于 控件只支持一个视图，因此忽略 viewName。

span.span: Because the control supports only one view, viewName is ignored.

summary.span: 获取与数据源控件关联的命名的数据源视图。

span.span: Gets the named data source view that is associated with the data source control.
The that is associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持只有一个数据源视图。The control supports only one data source view. 像所有的数据源视图对象一样与数据源控件相关联的对象定义其功能、 执行的所有工作，需要从基础数据库中，检索数据并都执行操作，如排序，插入、 删除和更新。Like all data source view objects, the object that is associated with the data source control defines its capabilities, performs all work that is necessary to retrieve data from the underlying database, and performs operations, such as sorting, inserting, deleting, and updating.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Collections.ICollection GetViewNames() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetViewNames () As ICollection

summary.span: 获取名称的集合，这些名称表示与 控件关联的视图对象的列表。

span.span: Gets a collection of names representing the list of view objects that are associated with the control.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含与 控件关联的视图的名称。

span.span: An that contains the names of the views associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件仅支持一个视图针对其基础数据。The control supports only one view on its underlying data. 方法返回的此一个视图名称作为字符串的单个元素集合。The method returns a single-element collection of this one-view name as a string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ GroupBy { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指定如何对查询结果分组的 Entity SQL 表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets the Entity SQL expression that specifies how to group the query results.

value.span: GROUP BY 子句。

span.span: The GROUP BY clause.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Include { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指定要包含在查询结果中的相关对象的表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets the expression that specifies the related objects to include in the query results.

value.span: 要在查询结果中返回的以逗号分隔的查询路径列表。

span.span: Comma-separated list of query paths to return in the query results.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控件指定逗号分隔的定义以及专门查询的对象返回对象 thatare 的查询路径列表。The property of the control specifies a comma-separated list of query paths that define the objects thatare returned together with the specifically queried object. 字符串中的每个以逗号分隔值传递，而不进行修改，作为单独调用方法通过执行[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。Each comma-separated value in the string is passed, without modification, as a separate call to the method of an that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]. 此查询是通过调整的数据源控件。This query is the source of the data regulated by the control. 属性是应用于参数执行之前。The property is the argument applied to the before it is executed. 字符串提供给属性使用相同的格式为字符串的字符串传递给方法。The string supplied to the property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the method of . 有关如何使用查询路径以自动加载相关的对象的示例，请参阅[如何： 使用查询路径形状结果](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/100bf7f5-00ba-4c17-8e27-7a8a14831093)。For examples of how to use query paths to automatically load related objects, see [How to: Use Query Paths to Shape Results](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/100bf7f5-00ba-4c17-8e27-7a8a14831093). 当属性用于指定查询路径，将相关实体的属性仅用于只读数据绑定。When the property is used to specify query paths, the properties of the related entities can only be used for read-only data-binding. 如果相关的对象未显式包括在查询路径中，属性描述符仍可用于数据绑定，但属性本身返回 null 值。If related objects are not explicitly included in the query path, the property descriptors are still available for data binding, but the properties themselves return null values. 在这种情况下，必须显式加载相关的对象以显示其值。In this case, the related objects must be explicitly loaded to display their values. 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载相关对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1). ## Examples 下面的 XML 标记定义查询路径返回`SalesOrderHeader`与返回相关对象`Contact`对象。The following XML markup defines a query path that returns `SalesOrderHeader` objects related to the returned `Contact` object. 与每个`SalesOrderHeader`，相关`SalesOrderDetail`和`Address`对象也会返回。With each `SalesOrderHeader`, the related `SalesOrderDetail` and `Address` objects are also returned. ``` ``` 上面的 XML 示例等同于以下名为`customers`:The previous XML example is the same as the following named `customers`: ``` ObjectQuery customers = context.Contact .Where("it.ContactID = @ContactID", new ObjectParameter("ContactID", customerId)) .Include("SalesOrderHeader.SalesOrderDetail") .Include("SalesOrderHeader.Address"); ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Inserted As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs)

summary.span: 在数据源中创建新对象之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after a new object is created at the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加的对象创建数据源中时，或出现错误的对象数据保留到数据源时，将引发事件。The event is raised when the added object is created in the data source or if an error has occurred when the object data is persisted to the data source. 属性对象用于访问添加的对象。The property of the object is used to access the added object. 此对象的属性包含从数据源，包括任何数据源生成的值返回的值。The properties of this object contain values that are returned from the data source, including any data source-generated values. 如果对象持久保留到数据源时出现错误引发事件和属性对象设置为返回。If an error occurs when an object is persisted to the data source, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 如果你处理中的异常事件处理程序中，设置属性`true`。If you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 这可防止再次引发异常。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 当指定的值`false`为属性，重新引发异常。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Inserting As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs)

summary.span: 在将新对象保留到数据源之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before a new object is persisted to the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新对象保留到数据源之前，将引发事件。The event is raised before a new object is persisted to the data source. 事件可用于修改或验证所添加的对象、 添加的其他对象或取消该操作。The event enables you to modify or verify the object being added, add a different object, or cancel the operation. 你可以访问该对象添加从属性对象。You can access the object to be added from the property of the object. 如果提供了另一个对象，用户将负责在中设置正确的实体类型属性。If supplying a different object, the user is responsible for setting the correct entity type in the property. 若要停止从所添加的对象，设置属性对象传递给`true`。To stop the object from being added, set the property of the object to `true`. 如果创建一个新对象时出错引发事件和属性对象设置为返回。If an error occurs when creating a new object, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 当处理中的异常事件处理程序中，设置属性`true`。When you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 这可防止再次引发异常。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 当指定的值`false`为属性，重新引发异常。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InsertParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 获取在插入操作过程中使用的参数的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that are used during an insert operation.

value.span: 在插入操作过程中使用的参数。

span.span: The parameters that are used during an insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于面向 ASP.NET 4 或更早版本的 web 应用程序，属性值存储在视图状态，并自动维护之间回发。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4 or earlier, the property value is stored in view state and is automatically maintained between postbacks. 对于 web 应用程序面向 ASP.NET 4.5，该属性值不存储视图状态中，必须设置为每个 HTTP 请求的值。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4.5, the property value is not stored in view state, and you must set the value for each HTTP request.

Protected Overrides Sub LoadControlState (savedState As Object)

span.span: Loads the state of the properties in the control that need to be persisted.

span.span: Adds a event handler to the control that contains the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ OrderBy { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指定如何对查询结果进行排序的 Entity SQL 表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets the Entity SQL expression that specifies how to order the query results.

value.span: ORDER BY 子句。

span.span: The ORDER BY clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控件是一个字符串，表示实体 SQL 查询的表达式。The property of the control is a string that represents an expression of an Entity SQL query. 此字符串而不进行修改，即传递到通过执行[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。This string is passed, without modification, to an that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]. 此查询是通过调整的数据源控件。This query is the source of the data regulated by the control. 字符串提供给属性使用相同的格式为字符串的字符串传递给方法。The string supplied to the property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the method of . 有关如何使用对查询结果进行排序的子句的示例，请参阅[如何： 对数据进行排序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c05f2506-cb9d-4ebc-822b-300042ad53e7)。For examples of how to use the clause to order query results, see [How to: Sort Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c05f2506-cb9d-4ebc-822b-300042ad53e7). ## Examples 以下示例中，在.aspx 文件中的 XML 标记从控件中检索一个值，并将其传递作为参数传递给属性。The XML markup in the following example, in an .aspx file, retrieves a value from a control and passes it as a parameter to the property. ``` ``` 上面的 XML 示例等效于以下名为`onlineOrders`:The previous XML example is equivalent to the following named `onlineOrders`: ``` ObjectQuery onlineOrders = context.SalesOrderHeader .Where("it.OnlineOrderFlag = TRUE AND it.TotalDue > @ordercost", new ObjectParameter("ordercost", orderCost)) .OrderBy("it.TotalDue DESC"); ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OrderByParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 获取用于创建 ORDER BY 子句的参数的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that are used to create the ORDER BY clause.

value.span: 用于创建 ORDER BY 子句的参数。

span.span: The parameters that are used for creating the ORDER BY clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性控件设置为`true`，该控件自动生成 ORDER BY 子句中的参数从分配给属性。When the property of the control is set to `true`, the control automatically generates an ORDER BY clause from the parameter in the assigned to the property. 这消除了需要显式将分配到 ORDER BY 子句属性。This eliminates the need to explicitly assign an ORDER BY clause to the property. ORDER BY 子句的构造属性需要集合中参数的属性标识从查询返回的项的单个属性。The construction of the ORDER BY clause from the property requires that the property of the parameter in the collection identifies a single property of the item that is returned from the query. ## Examples 下面的示例自动生成 ORDER BY 子句，并使用的值`orderByDropDownList`设置参数的值。The following example automatically generates the ORDER BY clause and uses the value of the `orderByDropDownList` to set the value of the parameter. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueryCreated As EventHandler(Of QueryCreatedEventArgs)

summary.span: 出现在 创建配置 控件过程中指定的 Entity SQL 之后。

span.span: Occurs after the creates an Entity SQL query that was specified during the configuration of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅[到 EntityDataSource 应用 LINQ 查询](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cb70db56-9f9d-4b79-98fe-f03dd5ad1e38)。For more information, see [Applying LINQ Queries to EntityDataSource](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cb70db56-9f9d-4b79-98fe-f03dd5ad1e38).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance object SaveControlState() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function SaveControlState () As Object

summary.span: 保存 控件中需要保留的属性的状态。

span.span: Saves the state of the properties in the control that need to be persisted.
The that contains state information.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Select { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置投影，该投影定义要包括在查询结果中的属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the projection that defines the properties to include in the query results.

value.span: 用于创建 ORDER BY 子句的参数。

span.span: The parameters that are used for creating the ORDER BY clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控件包含一个字符串，表示实体 SQL 查询的语句。The property of the control contains a string that represents the statement of an Entity SQL query. 这使你可以预测一组指定的属性从查询返回的对象。This enables you to project a specified set of properties from the objects returned by the query. 此字符串而不进行修改，即传递到通过执行[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。This string is passed, without modification, to the that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]. 此查询是通过调整的数据源控件。This query is the source of the data regulated by the control. 字符串提供给属性使用相同的格式为字符串的字符串传递给方法。The string supplied to the property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the method of . 有关如何使用子句定义查询投影的示例，请参阅[如何： 执行查询该返回匿名类型的对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3b264025-e911-4d73-90ce-992d2b9d189d)。For examples of how to use the clause to define a projection for a query, see [How to: Execute a Query that Returns Anonymous Type Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3b264025-e911-4d73-90ce-992d2b9d189d). 投影的数据不支持更新。Updates are not supported for projected data. 这意味着，当你使用属性指定投影时，绑定的数据绑定不支持更新。This means that when you use the property to specify a projection, the bound data binding does not support updates. 当使用启用的分页定义投影时，必须定义对结果进行排序依据的属性。When you define a projection with paging enabled, you must define the property by which to order the results. 这意味着在你设置属性定义投影，并且拥有设置为`true`，还必须设置属性来定义的顺序或设置属性`true`并添加订单通过参数集合。This means the when you set the property to defined a projection and have set to `true`, you must also set the property to define the order or set the property to `true` and add an ORDER BY parameter to the collection. 如果不能设置， ，或已启用。 cannot be set if , , or is enabled. 如果设置为返回的属性投影的查询 (例如， `SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`)、 一个将返回。If the is set to a query that returns a projection of properties (for example, `SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`), a will be returned. ## Examples 下面的 XML 标记使用属性指定投影具有六个产品类型的属性：The following XML markup uses the property to specify a projection with six of the properties of the Product type: ``` ``` 上面的 XML 示例等同于以下名为`products`:The previous XML example is the same as the following named `products`: ``` ObjectQuery products = context.Product .Select(it.[ProductID], it.[Name], it.[ListPrice], it.[Size], it.[Style], it.[Weight]) .OrderBy("it.[ProductID]"); ```

exception.span: 当 属性指定了查询投影且 、 或 的值为 时。

span.span: When the property specifies a query projection and the value of , , or is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Selected As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs)

summary.span: 在执行查询之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after a query has been executed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之后执行的查询并返回数据，将引发事件。The event is raised after a query has been executed and data has been returned. 它也会引发如果查询准备或执行期间出错。It is also raised if an error occurred during query preparation or execution. 属性对象包含的从查询返回的对象。The property of the object contains an of objects that are returned from the query. 处理事件以检索和存储返回中的实体。Handle the event to retrieve and store returned entities in the . 这样做来持久保存在页上的对象更改。Do this to persist object changes on the page. 属性对象显示在所有页中，而不考虑分页的数据绑定控件所传递的值的对象总数。The property of the object shows the total number of objects in all pages, regardless of the values passed by the data-bound control for paging. 是仅检索如果数据绑定控件需要它，如启用分页。 is only retrieved if the data-bound control needs it, such as if paging is enabled. 如果准备或执行查询时出错引发事件时，属性对象设置为返回，和属性设置为`null`。If an error occurs when the query is prepared or executed, the event is raised, the property of the object is set to the returned , and the property is set to `null`. 如果你处理中的异常事件处理程序中，设置属性`true`。If you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 这可防止再次引发异常。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 当指定的值`false`为属性，重新引发异常。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Selecting As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceSelectingEventArgs)

summary.span: 在构建并执行查询之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before a query is constructed and executed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造并执行查询之前，将引发事件。The event is raised before a query is constructed and executed. 处理事件要修改的配置或读取或更改数据绑定控件中的参数，构建并执行查询之前。Handle the event to modify the configuration of the or read or change the arguments from the data-bound control before the query is constructed and executed. 设置属性对象传递给`true`以取消查询。Set the property of the object to `true` to cancel the query. 取消选择操作时，没有数据返回到数据绑定控件。When the SELECT operation is canceled, no data is returned to the data-bound control. 如果`AllowPaging`设置为`true`在数据绑定控件中，时，将调用和上查询生成器方法使用的值和的属性对象。If `AllowPaging` is set to `true` in the data-bound control, the invokes the and query builder methods on using the values of the and properties of the object. 如果`AllowSorting`设置为`true`在数据绑定控件中，的对象可以更改时处理事件。If `AllowSorting` is set to `true` in the data-bound control, the of the object can be changed when the event is handled. 任何其他查询运算符，如 WHERE 或 ORDER BY、 页面标记中指定的应用后引发事件。Any other query operators, such as WHERE or ORDER BY, that are specified in the page markup are applied after the event is raised.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SelectParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 获取用于创建投影的参数的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that are used to create the projection.

value.span: 用于创建投影的参数。

span.span: The parameters that are used for creating the projection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如方法类，可以将参数传递到由定义投影属性。Like the method of the class, parameters can be passed to the projection that is defined by the property. 属性控件指定包含要提供给查询的 SELECT 语句的参数。The property of the control specifies a that contains the parameters to supply to the SELECT statement of the query. 属性使用命名自变量来提供给字符串中指定的参数引用属性。The property uses named arguments to refer to the parameters that are specified in the string that is supplied to the property. 如果属性未设置，不进行任何参数替换。If the property is not set, no parameter substitution is made. 在 SELECT 语句中，为前缀的所有参数名称"`@"`符号`,`必须具有匹配名称。All the parameter names in the SELECT statement, prefixed by the "`@"` symbol`,` must have a matching name in the . 中的参数不允许空值。Null values are not allowed for parameters in a .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool StoreOriginalValuesInViewState { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示数据源中的数据是否存储在视图状态中，以确保数据在更新或删除之前不会由其他进程更改。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data from the data source should be stored in view state to make sure that the data has not been changed by another process before it is updated or deleted.

value.span: 如果将值存储在视图状态中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the values will be stored in view state; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改时跟踪更新和删除操作已启用，控件必须存储原始值中加载对象的信息。To track changes when update and delete operations are enabled, the control must store information about original values of loaded objects in the . 视图状态中存储此所需的信息将增加的页面大小。Storing this required information in the view state will increase the page size. 你可以禁用存储视图状态中的原始值，通过设置属性`false`。You can disable storing original values in the view state by setting the property to `false`. 如果执行此操作，[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]无法跟踪已更新的对象中的并发。If you do this, the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] cannot track concurrency in updated objects. 有关详细信息，请参阅[更新数据 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ca153eec-6817-4c1d-b262-efd6d35b0246)。For more information, see [Updating Data (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ca153eec-6817-4c1d-b262-efd6d35b0246).

MemberSignature.Value: Custom Event Exception As EventHandler(Of DynamicValidatorEventArgs) Implements System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Web.UI.WebControls.IQueryableDataSource.RaiseViewChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 通知数据绑定控件，告知其参数对象已更改，并且数据绑定控件需要刷新。

span.span: Notifies the data-bound control that a parameter object has changed and the data-bound control needs to refresh.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void TrackViewState() cil managed

summary.span: 导致跟踪服务器控件的视图状态的更改，以便这些更改可以存储到服务器控件的 对象中。

span.span: Causes tracking of view-state changes to the server control so they can be stored in the server control's object.

summary.span: 通过 属性可访问此对象。

span.span: This object is accessible through the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Updated As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs)

summary.span: 在将对象更改保留到数据源之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after changes to an object have been persisted to the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时对已修改对象的更改保存到数据源，或如果错误发生在应用更改时引发事件。The event is raised when changes to a modified object are persisted to the data source or if an error has occurred when applying changes. 属性对象用于访问已修改的对象。The property of the object is used to access the modified object. 此对象的属性包含从数据源，包括任何服务器生成的值返回的值。The properties of this object contain values returned from the data source, including any server-generated values. 如果更改将永久保存到数据源时出现错误引发事件和属性对象设置为返回。If an error occurs when changes are persisted to the data source, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 如果你处理中的异常事件处理程序中，设置属性`true`。If you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 这可防止再次引发异常。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 当指定的值`false`为属性，重新引发异常。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UpdateParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 获取在更新操作过程中使用的参数的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that are used during an update operation.

value.span: 在更新操作过程中使用的参数。

span.span: The parameters that are used during an update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于面向 ASP.NET 4 或更早版本的 web 应用程序，属性值存储在视图状态，并自动维护之间回发。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4 or earlier, the property value is stored in view state and is automatically maintained between postbacks. 对于 web 应用程序面向 ASP.NET 4.5，该属性值不存储视图状态中，必须设置为每个 HTTP 请求的值。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4.5, the property value is not stored in view state, and you must set the value for each HTTP request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Updating As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs)

summary.span: 在将对象更改保留到数据源之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before changes to an object are persisted to the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前对对象的属性的更改保存到数据源，将引发事件。The event is raised before changes to the properties of an object are persisted to the data source. 事件可用于修改或验证对对象的更改、 提供不同的对象，或保留所做的更改之前取消该操作。The event enables you to modify or verify changes to the object, supply a different object, or cancel the operation before the changes are persisted. 你可以访问的已修改的对象从属性对象。You can access the modified object from the property of the object. 如果提供了另一个对象，用户将负责在中设置正确的实体类型属性。If supplying a different object, the user is responsible for setting the correct entity type in the property. 处理事件，如果必须修改要设置不同的原始值进行并发控制的对象。Handle the event if you must modify the for the object to set different original values for concurrency control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保存更改和管理并发](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e)。For more information, see [Saving Changes and Managing Concurrency](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e). 若要停止从保留的更改，设置属性对象传递给`true`。To stop the changes from being persisted, set the property of the object to `true`. 如果实例化对象时出错或修改属性，引发事件和属性对象设置为返回。If an error occurs when instantiating an object or modifying properties, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 当处理中的异常事件处理程序中，设置属性`true`。When you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 这可防止再次引发异常。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 当指定的值`false`为属性，重新引发异常。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Where { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指定如何筛选查询结果的 Entity SQL 表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets the Entity SQL expression that specifies how to filter the query results.

value.span: WHERE 子句。

span.span: The WHERE clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控件是一个字符串，表示子句，它是实体 SQL 查询的谓词。The property of the control is a string that represents a clause that is the predicate of an Entity SQL query. 此字符串而不进行修改，即传递到通过执行[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。This string is passed, without modification, to an that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]. 此查询是通过调整的数据源控件。This query is the source of the data regulated by the control. 字符串提供给属性使用相同的格式为字符串的字符串传递给方法。The string supplied to the property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the method of . 有关如何使用子句来筛选查询的示例，请参阅[如何： 筛选器数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776f8556-3350-4572-804a-b1513515c1b2)。For examples of how to use the clause to filter a query, see [How to: Filter Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776f8556-3350-4572-804a-b1513515c1b2). 若要通过使实体类型属性等于表达式筛选查询结果，请参阅信息属性。To filter query results by equating an entity type property to an expression, see information about the property. ## Examples 以下示例中，在.aspx 文件中的 XML 标记从控件中检索一个值，并将其传递作为参数传递给属性。The XML markup in the following example, in an .aspx file, retrieves a value from a control and passes it as a parameter to the property. ``` ``` 上面的 XML 示例等同于以下名为`onlineOrders`:The previous XML example is the same as the following named `onlineOrders`: ``` ObjectQuery onlineOrders = context.SalesOrderHeader .Where("it.OnlineOrderFlag = TRUE AND it.TotalDue > @ordercost", new ObjectParameter("ordercost", orderCost)) .OrderBy("it.TotalDue DESC"); ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WhereParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 获取用于创建 WHERE 子句的参数的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that are used to create the WHERE clause.

value.span: 用于创建 WHERE 子句的参数。

span.span: The parameters that are used for creating the WHERE clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如方法类，可以将参数传递到分配给谓词属性。Like the method of the class, parameters can be passed to the predicate assigned to the property. 属性控件指定包含要提供给查询的 WHERE 子句的参数。The property of the control specifies a that contains the parameters to supply to the WHERE clause of the query. 属性使用命名自变量来提供给字符串中指定的参数引用属性。The property uses named arguments to refer to the parameters that are specified in the string that is supplied to the property. 如果属性未设置，不进行任何参数替换。If the property is not set, no parameter substitution is made. WHERE 子句中的所有参数名称前面都带有符号"`@"`必须具有匹配名称。All the parameter names in the WHERE clause preceded by the symbol "`@"` must have a matching name in the . 中的参数不允许空值。Null values are not allowed for parameters in a . ## Examples 以下示例中，在.aspx 文件中的 XML 标记从控件中检索一个值，并将其传递作为参数传递给属性。The XML markup in the following example, in an .aspx file, retrieves a value from a control and passes it as a parameter to the property. ``` ``` 上面的 XML 示例等同于以下名为`onlineOrders`:The previous XML example is the same as the following named `onlineOrders`: ``` ObjectQuery onlineOrders = context.SalesOrderHeader .Where("it.OnlineOrderFlag = TRUE AND it.TotalDue > @ordercost", new ObjectParameter("ordercost", orderCost)) .OrderBy("it.TotalDue DESC"); ```
